facebookAccount.notes: time the system automatically retrieves new cookies from email/password, unit is minute. If null, no auto refresh. Recommended 1440 (1 day) or 4320 (3 days).

notesLanguage: Change to your language with ISO 639-1 code, available: vi (Vietnamese), en (English).

whiteListMode.notes: If enabled, only IDs in whiteListIds can use the bot.

database.notes: (1) type: 'json', 'sqlite', or 'mongodb'. (2) autoSyncWhenStart = sync db on start (slower). (3) autoRefreshThreadInfoFirstTime = refresh thread info on first msg.

autoRestart.notes: Set interval in ms or cron syntax. Example: 1000, 60000, 3600000, 86400000, or cron like '0 0 * * *'. If null/0/false = disabled.

autoUptime.notes: timeInterval in seconds. url = endpoint to ping (auto detect for glitch/replit).

autoLoadScripts.notes: Auto reload scripts when changed. Use ignoreCmds/ignoreEvents to exclude specific ones (separate by space).

restartListenMqtt.notes: Values are ms. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

notiWhenListenMqttError.notes: If the bot fails listening to MQTT (account locked, spam block, etc.), notifications can be sent.

gmail.note: Bot uses gmailAccount to send to emailGetNoti. Multiple emails separated by space.

telegram.note: Bot can notify multiple chatIds separated by space. Example: 123456789 987654321
